Sentencas: The importance of heterogeneous catalysis in single-chamber solid oxide fuel cells (SC-SOFC) is universally recognized, but little studied.
Titulo: Catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ anodes in a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell reactor

Sentencas: This work presents a thorough investigation of the catalytic activity of three Ni-YSZ half-cells in a well-described single-chamber reactor.
Titulo: Catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ anodes in a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell reactor

Sentencas: One in-house electrolyte-supported and two commercially available anode-supported half-cells composed of anodes with thicknesses ranging from 50 mu m to 1.52 mm are investigated.
Titulo: Catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ anodes in a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell reactor

Sentencas: They are exposed to methane and oxygen gas mixtures within CH(4):O(2) flow rate ratios (R(in)) of 0.8-2.0 and furnace temperatures of 600-800 degrees C.
Titulo: Catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ anodes in a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell reactor

Sentencas: The conversion of methane always results in the formation of syngas species (H(2) and CO).
Titulo: Catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ anodes in a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell reactor

Sentencas: However, their yields vary considerably based on the individual anode, the operating temperature, and R(in).
Titulo: Catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ anodes in a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell reactor

Sentencas: The SC-reactor design and the presence of hot-spots at the reactor entrance bring the methane and oxygen conversion rates well above the limit expected from experiments carried out with anode half-cells only.
Titulo: Catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ anodes in a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell reactor

Sentencas: Major variations in the H(2)/CO ratio are observed.
Titulo: Catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ anodes in a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell reactor

Sentencas: In lowering the temperature from 800 degrees C to 600 degrees C, it spreads from well below to well above the stoichiometric value of 2.0 expected for the partial oxidation reaction.
Titulo: Catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ anodes in a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell reactor

Sentencas: To optimize the SC-SOFC any further, the findings stress the need to undertake even more catalytic studies of its electrode materials under actual structure and morphology as well as final reactor configuration.
Titulo: Catalytic activity of Ni-YSZ anodes in a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell reactor
